entry.title: VALUE CHAIN GAP CASHEWNUT INDUSTRY
entry.summary: Cashew nut farmers in kenya faced a lot of challenge in marketing the law nut because the middlemen are are buying the nuts at a throw away prices.That lead us to research on cashew nut production in the world.Supplies and demand analysis.result was that demand…
entry.content: Cashew nut farmers in kenya faced a lot of challenge in marketing the law nut because the middlemen are are buying the nuts at a throw away prices.That lead us to research on cashew nut production in the world.Supplies and demand analysis.result was that demand is very high and the suppies is very low.

entry.title: COACH EMPOWERMENT, ENRICHMENT AND EMPLOYMENT PROGRAM
entry.summary: Our vision:To be a leadind microfinance by empowering youth,women and people with dissability in job creation in rural/urban in africa. Our mission:To erradicate poverty in the community by unlocking the potential and ability in youth and women and use the local resources/human resource by encouranging…
entry.content:
Our vision:To be a leadind microfinance by empowering youth,women and people with dissability in job creation in rural/urban  in africa.

Our mission:To erradicate poverty in the community by unlocking the potential and ability in youth and women and use the local resources/human resource by encouranging a culture of saving.
